data.title: Be part of something bigger
data.meta_description: Find out more about how we can work together effectively to help power the public sector and deliver vital services across the UK.
data.text:
I will shortly be finishing my second contract via PSR and have already begun discussing my next opportunity with their experienced recruitment team. With access to so many interesting roles right across the public sector, PSR is always my first port of call.​

The PSR team are always happy to answer my questions about the role, and I found the recruitment process to be straightforward. Once in contract, the time sheet process coupled with prompt payment are a huge positive but if ever there are any queries, I can easily contact the PSR helpdesk team or access the online self-service portal with any questions which are promptly resolved.​

Keep up the great work PSR and I will keep returning for my next contract.​
